citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40am on
9/4/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by knocking several times on the facility door, calling the
provided contact number, leaving a voicemail, and sending an email to the contact on file. Failure to provide access to the
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result
in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40am on 
9/4/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by knocking several times on the facility door, calling the 
provided contact number, leaving a voicemail, and sending an email to the contact on file. Failure to provide access to the 
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result 
in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
